description: Pipeline for parsing Nginx access logs. Requires the geoip and user_agent plugins.

script.inline: boolean isPrivate(def ip) { try { StringTokenizer tok = new StringTokenizer(ip, '.'); int firstByte = Integer.parseInt(tok.nextToken());       int secondByte = Integer.parseInt(tok.nextToken());       if (firstByte == 10) {         return true;       }       if (firstByte == 192 && secondByte == 168) {         return true;       }       if (firstByte == 172 && secondByte >= 16 && secondByte <= 31) {         return true;       }       if (firstByte == 127) {         return true;       }       return false;     } catch (Exception e) {       return false;     }   }   def found = false;   for (def item : ctx.nginx.access.remote_ip_list) {     if (!isPrivate(item)) {       ctx.nginx.access.remote_ip = item;       found = true;       break;     }   }   if (!found) {     ctx.nginx.access.remote_ip = ctx.nginx.access.remote_ip_list[0];   }
